text: Dayak languages is a language family which refers to the languages spoken by Dayak people who predominantly lived in Kalimantan. ==List of Dayak languages== ISO code Name Spoken by apg Ampanang Ampanang bdb Basap Basap bei Bakati’ Bakati’ bfg Busang Kayan Busang Kayan bhv Bahau Bahau bjn Banjar Banjar bkn Bukitan Bukitan bkr Bakumpai Bakumpai blj Bolongan Bolongan bqr Burusu Burusu bth Biatah Bidayuh Biatah Bidayuh bve Berau Berau bvk Bukat Bukat bvu Bukit Bukit byd Benyadu’ Benyadu’ djo Jangkang Jangkang dun Dusun Deyah Deyah duq Dusun Malang Malang duw Dusun Witu Witu emb Embaloh Embaloh hov Hovongan Hovongan iba Iban Iban kkx Kohin Kohin knl Keninjal Keninjal knx Kendayan Kendayan kqv Okolod Okolod kzi Kelabit Kelabit lbx Lawangan Lawangan lgi Lengilu Lengilu lnd Lun Bawang Lun Bawang lra Rara Bakati’ Rara mhy Ma’anyan Ma’anyan mqg Kota Bangun Kutai Kutai msa Malai Malai mtd Mualang Mualang mvv Tagal Murut Tagal mxd Modang Modang nij Ngaju Ngaju otd Ot Danum Ot Danum pku Paku Paku pni Aoheng Aoheng puc Punan Merap Merap pud Punan Aput Aput puf Punan Merah Merah puj Punan Tubu Tubu put Putoh Putoh rir Ribun Ribun sbr Sembakung Murut Sembakung sbx Seberuang Seberuang scg Sanggau Sanggau sdm Semandang Semandang sdo Bukar-Sadong Bidayuh Sadong Dayak sge Segai Segai sjb Sajau Basap Sajau slg Selungai Murut Selungai snv Sa’ban Sa’ban sre Sara Bakati’ Sara sya Siang Siang tid Tidong Tidong tjg Tunjung Tunjung tmn Taman Taman tsg Tausug Tausug twy Tawoyan Tawoyan ulu Uma’ Lung Uma’ Lung vkt Tenggarong Kutai Tenggarong whk Wahau Kenyah Wahau whu Wahau Kayan Wahau xay Kayan Mahakam Mahakam xdy Malayic Dayak Melayu Kalimantan xem Kembayan Kembayan xkd Mendalam Kayan Mendalam xke Kereho Kereho xkl Mainstream Kenyah Kenyah xkn Kayan Kayan xky Uma’ Lasan Uma’ Lasan ==Related pages== * Dayak people Category:Languages of Indonesia Category:Austronesian languages
